mapper.insert: INSERT INTO customer(cs_no, cs_type, cs_title, cs_contents, cs_file1, cs_thumb1, cs_size1, cs_rdate, m_no) VALUES(cs_seq.nextval, #{cs_type}, #{cs_title}, #{cs_contents}, #{cs_file1}, #{cs_thumb1}, #{cs_size1}, sysdate, #{m_no})
mapper.select: SELECT cs_no, cs_type, cs_title, cs_contents, cs_file1, cs_thumb1, cs_size1, cs_rdate, cs_cnt, m_no FROM customer ORDER BY cs_no DESC
SELECT cs_no, cs_type, cs_title, cs_contents, cs_file1, cs_thumb1, cs_size1, cs_rdate, cs_cnt, m_no FROM customer WHERE m_no=#{m_no} ORDER BY cs_no DESC

SELECT r.m_no as r_mno, r.mname as r_mname, r.email as r_email, c.cs_no, c.m_no, c.cs_type, c.cs_file1, c.cs_thumb1, cs_size1 ,cs_title, c.cs_contents, c.cs_rdate, c.cs_cnt FROM member r, customer c WHERE r.m_no = c.m_no ORDER BY c.cs_no DESC

SELECT r.m_no as r_mno, r.id as r_mid, r.mname as r_mname, r.email as r_email, c.cs_no, c.m_no, c.cs_type, c.cs_file1, c.cs_thumb1, cs_size1 ,cs_title, c.cs_contents, c.cs_rdate, c.cs_cnt FROM member r, customer c WHERE r.m_no = c.m_no AND c.m_no=#{m_no} ORDER BY c.cs_no DESC

SELECT r.m_no as r_mno, r.id as r_mid, r.mname as r_mname, r.email as r_email, c.cs_no, c.m_no, c.cs_type, c.cs_file1, c.cs_thumb1, cs_size1 ,cs_title, c.cs_contents, c.cs_rdate, c.cs_cnt FROM member r, customer c WHERE r.m_no = c.m_no AND cs_no=#{cs_no}
